DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Absorption , Metabolism Excretion 14C-JNJ-63623872 After Single Dose Healthy Male Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , open-label ( people know identity intervention ) , single dose study 6 healthy adult male participant characterize absorption , metabolism excretion 14C-JNJ-63623872 . The total study duration approximately 16 day per participant . The study consist 3 part : Screening ( , 28 day study commences Day 1 ) ; open-Label Treatment Phase ( , Day 1 ) ; Follow-up ( , Day 16 ) . All eligible participant receive 14C-JNJ-63623872 dose level 600 milligram . Participants enter study site Day -1 stay study site least Day 8 . Urine , feces , whole blood sample , plasma , nasal mucus saliva sample collect Day 8 . Unchanged JNJ-63623872 determined plasma , feasible , saliva . Participants ' safety monitor throughout study .
